wordGroup: hepatitis b n. 乙型肝炎
hepatitis c 丙型肝炎；C型肝炎
hepatitis b virus 乙型肝炎病毒；[病毒学]B型肝炎病毒
hepatitis a 甲型肝炎，甲肝
hepatitis b vaccine n. 乙肝疫苗；乙型肝炎疫苗

sentences.en: The doctor tested him for hepatitis.
sentences.cn: 医生对他进行了肝炎病检查。

sentences.en: As a major health risk hepatitis is second only to tobacco.
sentences.cn: 肝炎仅次于烟草是主要的健康隐患之一。

sentences.en: We should require that every student is immunized against hepatitis B.
sentences.cn: 我们应该要求每一位学生都注射乙肝疫苗。
